317b8(rgyud 'grel): bsrung dang bza' ba la sogs pa'i// sdom pa'i bdag nyid can bsrung ngo // lus dang sreg la bltas med pas// dam tshig dang ni sdum pa bsrung // nyin dang mtshan ma len 
318a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum du// nyin re bzhin du bzlas par bya// gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// dgun zla 'bring po nas brtsams 
318a2(rgyud 'grel): te// zla ba re re bsrung bar bya// gnyis med gnyis med 'khor lo gnas// tshes bcu la ni de dag mchod// chang dang sha sogs ci yang rung // dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs// 
318a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gnyis med la gnas par// shrI he ru ka rab tu mchod// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya ste// dam tshig rab bsrungs bsod nams kyis// 
318a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// bud med mthong ba thams cad la// g.yon nas lan gsum bskor bya zhing // spyi bor phyag ni byas nas ni// lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab// 
318a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te// ji srid byang chub 'byung bar du// byang chub yan lag nu ma las// 'byung ba'i rang gi 'o mas skyongs// gnyis med ye shes spyod pa'i tshug/ sngon/ 
318a6(rgyud 'grel): du bslab pa blangs nas ni// nA da la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i// tshangs par spyod pa shin tu bsrung // dam tshig de la rtag gnas te// de sngon 'gro ba sbas pa yid// spyod dang grol 
318a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas 'dod pa'i// yid la 'dod pa kun grub 'gyur// gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la// mi bya ba ni ci yang med// tshangs par spyod pa rtag mnos la// 'dod pa lnga ni/ 
318a8(rgyud 'grel): spyod par gyis// gnyis med la gnas zas la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs brda// gnyis med pa dang thogs med pa// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa bya// mi mo 
318b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug legs spyad pa'i// tshangs spyod bsam gtan de bzhin ni// khro ba med par rgyun gcod pa// rtag tu sgrub po yongs su bsrung // yul kun la ni rnam rol cing // gnyis// 
318b2(rgyud 'grel): med grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma// srog ni ji srid gnas pa'i bar// bu khyod kyis ni bsgrub par gyis// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ci dga' bar ni brten par
318b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che// bsam nas thams cad rab tu brtag/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi gnas// de bas 'bad pa tham 
318b4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis// he ru ka dpal bdag mchod do// dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya// nam yang spang bar mi bya'o// mi shes pa 'am gti mug gis// de ni bstan par mi bya'o// 
318b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi bdag nyid mi spangs te// dka' thub kyis kyang gdung mi byed// ji ltar bde bas bde bar bzung // 'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas// gtso bos ji ltar bga' stsal pa// de 
318b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar bdag gis bgyid par 'tshal// dam tshig dang sdom pa bskyang ba'o// bstan par mi bya'o// de nas yol ba la sogs pas// dben par byas pa'i sa phyogs su// rang gi yid du 
318b7(rgyud 'grel): 'or zhing mdzes// gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs// yon dang ldan pa/ dam tshig dang sdom pa can/ rnal 'byor la mkhas pa/ shin tu dad pa can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan// 
318b8(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de bzhin nyid du gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i don du bla ma la phul la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs shing thal mo sbyar la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dngos ltar slob dpon la 
319a1(rgyud 'grel): bltas te/ skyob pa med pa'i skyob pa skyabs// 'khor lo sdom pa bdag la skyobs// rgyu med par ni thugs rje che// mgon med mgon bdag bka' drin gsol// bdag nyid che 
319a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod ji bzhin du// khyab bdag bdag kyang mdzad du gsol// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu// bdag bying 'di las bdag la skyobs// zhes bya ba 'dis gsol ba gdab la/ de nas bla mas kyang rnal// 
319a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ji lta ba bzhin kun nas mngon du byed cing de ma thag du tha mal pa'i bu med kyi gzugs bsal nas lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed do// rdo rje dang pad+ma 'du bya ba mngon du 'gro bas rdo rje 'chang gi nga rgyal 
319a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ka Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod nas/ de bzhin nyid kyis pad+ma'i nang rol tu rdo rje bsgrub par bya zhing / snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer 
319a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis gnas sna tshogs na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag nyid la bcug nas/ rim gyis dga' ba bzhi rtogs par byas la/ rdo rje'i nor bu nga yang lhan cig 
319a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa so so'i rang gis rig pa'i ngo ba bstan par bya ste/ mtha bo dang srin lag dag gis bsdams la rdo rje dang pad+ma nas brten la dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad 
319a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag nyid rtogs pas de'i mig dang lag pa'i spyod yul min la/ slob ma'i kha'i chu skyes kyi nam mkhar// 'di ni btung ba rin chen mchog/ lus ni rdo rjer rab bsgrub phyir// yid kyi chu ni btung 
319a8(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis// bu khyod kun tu ye shes 'gyur// zhes bya ba 'dis me tog gis gzhug go// des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid du rig pas a ho su kha zhes brjod pas/ 
319b1(rgyud 'grel): kha yi drangs pas/ rang gi longs spyod kyi sbugs su gzhug go/ de bzhin nyid kyang langs nas rang gi chu skyes kyi nang gi lhag ma sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa/ deng nas brtsams te bu khyod kyis// brtul 
319b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs bzang pos 'gro don gyis// bram ze rgyal rigs rdza rigs dang // dmangs rigs mthar skyes bu mo rnams// b+ha kha pad+ma tsum pa na// bdud rtsi rnams ni bsgrub par gyis// zhes brjod 
319b3(rgyud 'grel): de/ kha'i pad+ma nam mkhar gos pa med par gzhug par bya'o// de dag ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o// de ma thag du de bzhin nyid gcig par 'dod pa 'am// de bzhin nyid tha dad par 
319b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod par de mgon pos yang dag par rig par byas nas/ de bzhin gcig tu 'dod pas ni de bzhin nyid de de nyid la'o// tha dad pa la yang gzhan te dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa/ 
319b5(rgyud 'grel): sih+la dang ga bur dang yang dag par ldan pa/ la nyi shu rtsa lnga ma dang / rang rig pa tsam gyis ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar gsal ba ltar// 
319b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la'ang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje dang bdag stsol// zhes bya bas gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma la// de'i lag pa de'i lag par gtad nas/ sangs rgyas thams 
319b7(rgyud 'grel): cad dbang por byas te spyi bor rdo rje bzhag ste snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i bya ba sngon du 'gro bas// 
319b8(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi gzung ma nyams dga' 'di// brten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtags// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas// bde ba dam pa yang dag myong // thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya// 'gro 
320a1(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum na 'di dag pa// de bas 'di dang bral bar ni// khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med// rmongs 
320a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gang zhig 'da' byed na// mchog gi dngos grub de la med// zhes brjod la gtad par bya'o// de yang tsan dan dang gur gum la sogs pas rnam par byugs shing / shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog gi phreng 
320a3(rgyud 'grel): bas nye bar brgyan pas/ gos med par chu skyes kha phye bar mngon par gsal bar ston cing 'di skad smra bar bya'o// bshang gci la sogs za ba dang // khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/ rtag par 
320a4(rgyud 'grel): bu med mchog gus pas// b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'i byed par// bu khyod spro bar byed dam ci// bu khyod ji ltar bde bar smos zhes so// des kyang bshang gci la sogs za ba dang // bud med rtag tu 
320a5(rgyud 'grel): gus par bgyi// b+ha ga nyid la'o bgyid par// lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro// zhes brjed par bya'o// des kyang dga' ba dang byams pa dang bcas pas de skal ba bzang po sdug par 
320a6(rgyud 'grel): blta zhing / tsog cig pus chu skyes rab tu bstan nas 'di skad smra bar bya'o// e ma'o bdag gis pad+ma 'di// bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan// gang zhig cho ga bsten byed pa// de yi 
320a7(rgyud 'grel): mdun na bdagra ni gnas// rdzogs sangs mnyes par bya la sogs// bya ba ci yin pad mar gyis// bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni// 'di nyid na ni rtag tu zhugs// b+ha dza mok+Sha ho zhes pa'o// 
320a8(rgyud 'grel): des kyang rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas shes rab lha mo'i gzugs su skyed la/ yi ge hUM las rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje dkar ba// b+ha las nor bu dmar po b+ha ser pos bu ga bkag pa/ yi ge a wa 
320b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya 'di pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma gsum pa/ d+ha las ze'u 'bru dkar po d+ha ser pos bu ga bkag par bsam la/ g.yon gyi chu skyes kyi g.yon ngos nas gnas pa'i rtsa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ lce yi sbyor 
320b2(rgyud 'grel): bas bskyod cing / oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga~M Na badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ki haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas pa sngon du 'gro bas/ bla ma'i man ngag las dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba rtogs shing / rang gi snying 
320b3(rgyud 'grel): ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus can/ bla mas kyang de'i sems la spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams bcug pa dang 
320b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas dga' bar brtsams par bya'o// de nas bla mas yol ba'i phag tu A li kA li'i sgo nas slob ma'i rigs brtags la/ rigs nges pa'i phyag rgya rgyud nas gsungs pa bstan par bya'o// de nas rdo rje pad+ma 
320b5(rgyud 'grel): rab bzhag nas// byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// bskyod par byas nas dga' ba de// sems bskang nas ni bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor pa'i byang chub sems// ji srid gtong bar ma byed pa// de srid 
320b6(rgyud 'grel): kun dga' las byung ba'i// dga' skyes bde ba ci yang 'thob// dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa'i// byang chub sems ni lhung gyur na// phung po rnam shes brgyal ba las// ma smas dngos 
320b7(rgyud 'grel): grub ga la yod// mkha' dbyings rdo rje legs sbyor dang // reg las ngo mtshar chen po yi// bde ba 'byung ba gang yin de// mchog tu dga' bral dbus dag tu// mtshon cha brtags ste/ 
320b8(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bya// pad mkhar rdo rje'i lte ba yis// gnon gnas rdo rje skyil krung las// nor bu'i nang chud sems lta zhing // ye shes skyes gang de'i ngo bo mchog/ 'dod chags ma yin/ 
321a1(rgyud 'grel): chags bral min// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// gsum po spangs pa nyid las ni// lhan skyes yang dag byang chub brjod// gang tshe rnal 'byor pa shes lta// 
321a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ba yi bde bar gnas// thun naM yang na nyin gcig gam// zla phyed zla gcig khyud kar la// bskal pa bskal pa stong dag tu// ye shes mngon par brtson par gnas// de ltar brtags la nus 
321a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par gzung la bags kyis phyung la/ chu skyes nas ma gton par byang chub kyi sems dam tshig gi ngo bo de lce nyid kyi de kho na mthong bas blang bar bya'o// yang gsungs pa/ slob 
321a4(rgyud 'grel): mas brtags nas legs bzung ste// pad+ma'i nang du phyung nas ni// de nas sems ni lce yis su// blang bya byang chub sngon 'gro bas// zhes bya ste/ de dag ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o// 
321a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la sbyin par bya ba dbang bskur ba bzhi pa bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya ba ni/ 'di skad du/ de nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don du phun sum tshogs par byed pa/ rtog pa'i rnyog pa dang bral ba 
321a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rig pa dang tha mi dad pa/ thub pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid yid bzhin nor bu lta bu bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshig 
321a7(rgyud 'grel): gis sbyin par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste/ de yang ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshogs dbang bskur byin nas ni/ slob ma'i lhag par mos par sems kyis brtags la 
321a8(rgyud 'grel): rgya che zab pa'i tshul la shin tu mos pa na/ tshig nyid kyis ni dbang bskur rin chen sbyin par bya/ zhes pa yin no// rgya che ba la mos sam mi mos pa 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya zhan 
321b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i khyad par las te/ de yang gsungs pa du ba las ni mer shes shing // chu skyar las ni chur shes bya// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// rigs ni mtshan ma dag 
321b2(rgyud 'grel): las shes// bzhin gyi pad+ma rab dang zhing // dga' bas ba spu langs pa ni// mthong nas mkhas pa de nyid kyis// slob ma dam pa rjes su 'dzin zhes pas so// zhes bya ba ni 
321b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba te/ 'di ni yang sbyin pa zhes bya ba yin no// de nas sbyin sreg gis zhi bar bya ste/ dgang blugs gcig gam gsum mam bdun phul la yon brjod du gzhug go// de dag 
321b4(rgyud 'grel): gis kyang mgu ba'i yid kyis 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin/ sa gzhi 'am/ glang po'am/ rta'am/ gser ram/ rgyan nam/ bu 'am/ chung ma la sogs pa'am/ bdag nyid glegs nyid du dngos grub bam dge ba la sogs 
321b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yon tan nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/ 'bul lo// sangs rgyas zhing sogs dag bya'i phyir// khyad par du ni sbyin la spyod// dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis dang ni// bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang 'dra// bram ze stong phrag 
321b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dag kyang // dge slong gcig dang rab tu sbyar// dge slong stong phrag gnyis dang ni// rdul med pa ni gcig dang mnyam// rdul med stong phrag gnyis dang ni// ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbyar// ye shes ldan pa stong phrag 
321b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par mchod// de ltar sbyin pa'i zhing shes nas// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyin// rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i chos la ni// zhing bzang po las sa bon gdab// de nas yon phul 
321b8(rgyud 'grel): ba de blangs la/ zas dang gnas la sogs pa thams cad kyis rang gzhan dag tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod par bya ste/ skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams kyis bzung la/ che mchog sna tshogs pas tshim 
322a1(rgyud 'grel): / par byas la/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags dul bar ldan// 'od zer rnon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan// rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems dang ldan// he ru ka dpal sngags pa lhan cig gar byed do// 
322a2(rgyud 'grel): tAtA shwat+ma hA/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i gzung ngo // de nas mchod pa dang bston pa la sogs pa gdab ste/ i byed kyis sems cand na kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngas grub stsal// mar yang byen par mdzad 
322a3(rgyud 'grel): slad du// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol// oM AHhUM badz+ra muHzhes brjod de ye shes pa'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdag la bsdus te// lha'i nga rgyal brtan pas chos thams cad ni
322a4(rgyud 'grel): ma skyes pa'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o// zhes brjod cing rdo rje rtse mo'i shar phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams te// 'khor lo dbyi bar bya'o// de nas don du gnyer bdag la rdul tshon cung zad byin la// chu bo chen po thams cad la dor bar 
322a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// mtshams med pa dang sdig ngan yang // tshon rtsi mthong bas grol bar 'gyur// 'dir dbang bskur ba tsam gyis ni// gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// khung bu dgang dang rab gnas dang // sbyin sreg 'khor lo'i nor gang yin// 
322a6(rgyud 'grel): de kun slob dpon nyid yin zhes// rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs// bde mchog dkyil 'khor cho ga ni// mkhas rnams mngon par 'dod pa bzhin// bdag gis 'dir ni bkod pa la// bsod nams rgya che gang thob pa// de yi
322a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang 'gro ba kun// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin po che rab tu gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba// slob dpon dpal la ba pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
322a8(rgyud 'grel): ma lda 'i ma // / rgyag skad du/ shA tsekra sa pa ra sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he rug la phyag 'tshal lo// 
322b1(rgyud 'grel): yi dgas gdan la bzhugs shing zhal rnams kun la spyan gsum dang ni phag mo dmar mo'i lus// rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khrung gzhan gnyis kyis ni myur du glang chen gtso bo'i pags pa brkyangs// lhag ma g.yon pa'i phyag 
322b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhis kha T+wAM ga dang zhags pa mi thod tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'phyang // g.yas pas gri gug rtse gsum dgra sta rje chung 'chang ba'i he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// bde mchog 'khor lo gsang ba'i don// sgrub pa'i gsang sngags kun bsdus// 
322b3(rgyud 'grel): nas// brda yi skad kyis sbas pas te// sgrub pa'i thabs de bdag gis bshad// snying ga'i sa bon 'od tshogs kyis// mdun du bde gshegs spyan drangs nas// mchod pa kun gyis legs mchod de// dkon mchog
322b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum la sogs pa brjod// thams cad stong par rnam bsgoms nas// sna tshogs pad nyi hUM rdo rje// hUM byung mkha' 'gro'i tshogs spros te// blo dang ldan pas phur sogs bya// blo dang ldan pas mkha' dbyings su// 'byung ba
322b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'dus pa las// ji ltar sna tshogs gzhir gyur pa'i// 'byung ba bzhi yi rnam par bsgom// de yi rim pa 'di yin te// ba lang gnas kyi lci skam dang // lhag ma mgo skam de nas su// dung chen po yi ngo bo dang // mi byed
322b6(rgyud 'grel): rus skal dag 'gyur bas// phyag bzhi pa dang zhabs bzhi pa// de bzhin phyag 'bum bar du ste// sku mdog dkar po khro bo rje// rdo rje dril bu lus la 'khyud// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// sku la thal bas nye bar byugs// 
322b7(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// yi dgas chen po gdan du byas// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin chen po// de las kun tu rnam par 'phro// phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan// ral pa yi ni thor tshugs can// g.yas kyi
322b8(rgyud 'grel): zhal ni gnag pa ste// g.yon pa dmar ba 'jigs pa can// rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu dkar// rgyab ni gser du snang ba'o// dus min 'chi las rnam rgyal zhing // yan lag kha T+wAM ga dang sbyar// thod pa ar+g+ha snod kyis ni// 
323a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang mtshon char nges sbyar ba'o// de yi shes rab 'jigs pa mo// thod pa'i dum bu'i ska rags can// thod pa shin tu gang ba dang // de yi kha dog lag char 'dzin// ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs dang // 
323a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho chen po'i ngos dag la// gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du// de ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// ji ltar chos kyi skur gyur pa'o// de ltar sbrul dang bsrung bar bya// kha sbyar kha sbyor du gyur pa// rdo rje lu gu rgyu du brjod// rdo rje 
323a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byed byed pad+ma la// de tshe bung ba lta bur 'khor// bud pa rdo rje nyid du bshad// de nas rim bzhin spros byas nas// lcags kyu nyid kyis 'khyud bya ste// gtun shing gis ni bskyod par bya// dbyig pa'i mnga'i mnyam
323a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor te// de nas rig mkhu bar gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi// mA ra ba nyid du bdag la bskul// oM ma hA he ru ka badz+ra sA hA dzaHhU~M ba~M ho// sU ra ta s+t+waM dri sh+ya ho// zhes bya ba'i yongs su bskul ba 
323a5(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten khams kyi bde ba'i bdag/ ji ltar bskyed pa'i rims pa bzhin// gnyug ma'i sngags las byung gyur te// khu ba'i gzugs la rdo rje can// de nas AHhUM gnyis las bzhengs/ 
323a6(rgyud 'grel): kha dog sngon po 'jigs pa po// dmar po 'od kyis dkyil 'khor 'bar// zhal bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa can// drug gnyis phyag gis rnam par brgyan// u ma u ma'i bdag po mnan// nyin byed dbang phyug gdan du 
323a7(rgyud 'grel): bting // rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag/ g.yas pa kun da lta ba ste// g.yon pa dmar po 'jigs pa po// nub ni gser du 'bar ba'o// sngar gyi lag char yang dag ldan// spyan gsum gyis kyang yang dag mdzes// 
323a8(rgyud 'grel): cung zad khro zhing gzhad pa'i zhal// g.yon brkyang ba yi gar gyis bzhugs// de yi shes rab phag mo ni// dmar mo kha dog cher 'bar ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rnam par mdzes// rdo rje dang ni mi thod 'phyang // bcom ldan// 
323b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis zhal bzhi byin gyis brlab pa ni// oM suM b+ha ni sa~M b+hA huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-in+ta gr-ih+Na huM hU~M phaT// oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM AHna ya ho b+ha ga bAn ba d+hi rA dza huM huM phaT// de ni lugs las bzlog pa'o// 
323b2(rgyud 'grel): oM d+harma d+ha tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa'o// oM hi sIng gar rdo rje sems dpa'o// oM na ma hi spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad do// oM swA hu hu spyi gtsug tu pad+ma gar kyi dbang phyug go// oM bau Sha Ta h+ye mtshan bung gnyis su 
323b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka'o// oM hAM hUM ho mig gnyis su rdo rje nyi ma'o// oM phaT haM rta mgrin te// yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha'o// oM baM lte bar rdo rje phag mo'o// oM ha yoM snying gar gshin rje ma'o// oM hAM mo khar rmongs byed ma'o// 
323b4(rgyud 'grel): oM hreM spyi bor skyong byed ma'o// oM hUM hUM smri ga cag tu skrag byed ma'o// oM phaT phaT lha mo'i gnas thams cad la/ nye ba'i sgrub pa'o// snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hU~M ni thugs rdo rje'o// oM hrIHha 
323b5(rgyud 'grel): ha huM hUM phaT lkog mar gsung rdo rje'o// oM shrI badz+ra haM he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA ni dpral bar sku rdo rje'o// oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra war+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i snying gar ro// oM tsa haM/ 
323b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT lkog mar ro// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa ni hUM phaT dpral bar ro// spyi bor yi ge oM mo// snying gar yi ge hUM ngo // ze 'brul yi ge a'o// rked par ni yi ge swa'o// brlar ni yi ge ha'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'o// ye shes dam tshig 
323b7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gyur pas// de phyir 'di ni rdo rje brjod// dbang gi don ni bsgoms byas nas// phyis ni mchod pas nyes par bya// ling ga gnyis la sngags bkod la// sna rtser a yig rnam par dgod// de bzhin ling ga'i lte 
323b8(rgyud 'grel): ba la// yi ge ba ni rnam par bsam// bre ldan rnal 'byor ma la bsrab// dag pa'i lus ni dri ma med// ces bya ba 'di ni dang po'i rnal 'byor ro// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu rAg Na At+ma ko he// snying ga'i sa bon 
324a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis// bde bar gshegs pa spyan drangs te// a ba d+hU tI gnas de bzhin// smin ma'i bar du nges par gzhug/ dang por dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// de ni skad cig gis bsal bsgom/ 
324a2(rgyud 'grel): mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar gnas pa// rnal 'byor ma ni de bzhin no// 'bar ba'i phreng ba du ma ni// 'khor lo thams cad kyi ni sgo// zhal bzhi dpa' bo rnams kyis so// dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas yongs bskor// rtsa ba'i
324a3(rgyud 'grel): lam ni thams cad du// sngags pa ji ltar dbye 'dod na// de nyid dbye ba tha dad nyid// mkha' 'gro ma ni nyes sbyor byed// chags pa chen po dkyil 'khor ni// dgos pa'i phyir ni rab sgrub byed// dam pa'i rnal 'byor
324a4(rgyud 'grel): marnams kun// yul dang yul langs par sbyar// de nas mtha' 'gro ma rnams ni// gnas la rnam par gnas pa te// shar nas mkha' 'gro ma sngo skya'i 'od can no// byang nas lAm ljang ser ma'o// nub nas 
324a5(rgyud 'grel): dum skyes ma dmar ser ro// lho nas gzugs can ma dkar ser gyi mdog can te// 'di thams cad ni ro'i steng na thod pa dang gri khug lag na thogs pa/ sgra gyen du mdzes pa/ rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa zhal gcig pa/ 
324a6(rgyud 'grel): dbul sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyis mtshan pa yang dag par ldan pa gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o// thod pa rnams su glang po che dang ce spyang dang me dang pa'ang rnams rim pa ji lta ba'o// mtshams bzhir yang sngar gcig 
324a7(rgyud 'grel): gis ma tshang ba'i snod de// mgo ba pul+lI ma la yanas baN+Da ka pA laM dang rab tu gtum ma ste// so dang sen mo 'bab pa'o// spyi gzugs 'bar ba 'dzin pa nas mahA kaM ka la dang gsum pa'i mig can ma ste/ spu dang skra 'bab 
324a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rna ba g.yas pa o Di ya na nas kaM ka la dang 'od ldan ma ste/ pags pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o// lhag pa na arbud nas mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste sha 'bab pa'o// de dag ni shar phyogs 
324b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams lugs dang mthun pa'o// rna ba ga yon pa'i mchod sbyin nas dpa' bo bzang po dang / dpa' bo'i bla ma ste/ thams cad du chu chun 'bab pa'o// smin dbus dga' ba'i dbang phyug nas 'od dpag 
324b2(rgyud 'grel): tu med pa dang / mi mthung ma ste/ rus pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o// mig gnyis lha mo'i mkhar nas rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ de ni rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa'o// dpung pa mA la be nas rdo rje'i lus dang / 
324b3(rgyud 'grel): shing grib ma ste snying ga'i chu 'bab pa'o// de dag ni dbang ldan sa la sogs pa'i mtshams nas/ thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod ma rnams snyoms par zhugs pas zhugs so// de bzhin du mtshan khung 'dod pa'i 
324b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs nas aM gu ri dang / ai ra ba ti ste/ de rtag tu mig 'bab pa'o// nu ma gnyis po o dre nas// rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste/ 'bris pa 'bab pa'o// lte ba tri sha ku ni nas pa'o chen po 
324b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // rlung gi shugs can ma ste/ glo ba 'bab pa'o// sna'i rtse mo ko sa la nas/ badz+ra hUM ka ra dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa'o// de dag ni shar la sogs pa gnas so// kha ka ling ka nas 
324b6(rgyud 'grel): su b+ha dra dang // ljang lha mo ste/ log gis rtsa 'bab par bshad pa'o// mgrin pa lam+ba ka nas rdo rje bzang po dang / shin tu bzang mo ste/ lte bar 'bab pa'o// snying kany+tsi nas 'jigs byed chen mo dang / rtaR+Sha 
324b7(rgyud 'grel): ma ste/ bi sna ma 'bab pa'o// 'doms par hi mA la nas mig bzang dang / kha ga na ste/ mtshogs ma'i srubs 'bab pa ste/ mtshams su sngar bzhin te/ gsung gi 'khor los spyod ma ste/ de rnams ni 
324b8(rgyud 'grel): snyoms par zhugs pas rnam par gnas so// ling ge yi dgas lhag par gnas so// stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can te/ bad kan 'bab pa'o// bshang ba'i lam khyim gyi gnas nas rin chen 
325a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma ste dri ni rtag tu 'bab pa'o// brla sau rASh+Ta nas/ rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma ste/ khrag 'bab pa rab tu grags pa'o// byin pa gser gling nas/ nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor 
325a2(rgyud 'grel): lo'i go cha ma ste/ rdul 'bab par gyur pa'o// de dag ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs so// sor mo na ga ra nas ni dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' mo ste/ tshil 'bab pa'o// rkang pa'i rgyab sin+d+hu nas ni pad+ma gar gyi 
325a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang stobs chen mo ste/ 'di ni rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa'o// mthe bo ma ru nas/ rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo skur ma ste/ mchil ma 'bab pa'o// pus mo ku lu tA nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang 
325a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ byis pa'i stabs 'bab pa'o sngon bzhin mtshams rnams su ste/ sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og nas spyod pa rnams snyems par zhugs pas bzhugs so// shar gyi sgo nas khwa gdong ma'o// byang na 'ug gdong mag 
325a5(rgyud 'grel): ma/ gas sa ga gdus / rdzu 'tham gas pa mam kyi ga sa ldan pa/ ram na da 'du na pas/ bshA rnam pa sa 
325a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsgyur ba ste/ lugs dang mthun pa'o// pho nya mo rnams ni lugs dang mi mthun pas yang dag par rnam par bzhag ste/ me'i mtshams nas gshin rje'i pho nya ma'o// srin po'i mtshams nas gshin rje bstan ma'o// 
325a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung mtshams nas/ gshin rje mche ba gtsigs ma'o// dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas gshin rje 'joms ma ste/ 'di dag kyang kha dog gnyis gnyis ma'o// yid du 'ong ma snga ma lta bur ro la zhon pa'o// dpal he ru ka la sogs/ 
325a8(rgyud 'grel): pa dpa' bo rnams ni rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya can no// lha ma thams cad kyi phyag na gri gug dang thad pa thags pa/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum ma mche ba gtsigs pa/ thod pa'i 
325b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas brgyan pa/ 'od zer du ma spro zhing 'bar ba/ khro gnyer yon pos mig gis blta ba/ ro mnan cing de las 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma la gar gyis bzhugs pa'o// khwa'i gdong can ma la sogs pa bshad pa ni/ 
325b2(rgyud 'grel): stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ thor tshugs kyi nor bu dang / rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang rdo rje'i sked pa dang / thod pa'i phreng bas mgul pa brgyan pa de bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la dril bu g.yer
325b3(rgyud 'grel): kas brgyan pa/ shin tu g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o// gong gi dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi// he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba// mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi// phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o// ye shes dam tshig
325b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gyur pas// de phyir rdo rje zhes sum brjod// dbang gi don ni bsgom byas nas// phyi nas mchod pas mnyes byas te// thams cad snga ma lta bu'o// da ni byang chub phyogs kyi sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lha'i sbyor bas/ 
325b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bzhag ste// lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/ mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba nas/ mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o zhes bya ba'i bar/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang 
325b6(rgyud 'grel): chen pos gsungs te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lha'i rnam par dag pa'o// snying gi nang song pad+mar ni/ 'dab mo brgyad pa ge sar bcas// de'i nang du son pa'i rtsa// mar me lta bu'i rang bzhin te// chu shing / 
325b7(rgyud 'grel): gi ni me tog bzhin// 'phyang zhing kha ni 'og tu'o// de yi ngan song dpa' bo ni// yungs kar sbom phra'i tshad tsam ste// gzhon med hUM des sa bon ni// ba mo lta bu 'dzag pa nyid lus can rnams kyi snying dga' ba// de phyir zhes bya 
325b8(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bshad// me ni chen po'i gzugs kyis ni// phag mo'i thig le ru ni brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar// dpyid thob pas ni mnyes gyur nas// snyoms
326a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'jug pa rnam par dag/ 'di ni he ru ka dpal dpal// dpyid kyi thig ler brjod pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi tshul 'dzin ma// rgyu dang mi rgyu yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// sgo na 
326a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum 'byung bar// 'byung ba 'di ni 'jug pa ste// 'di dag thams cad lus la gnas// lte ba'i a yi tshul gyis ni// thung ngu ru ni yongs su grags// snying la hUM gi yi ge ni// ring po tshad gnyis dag du gnas/ 
326a3(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par oM gyi gzugs kyi ni// shin tu ring po tshad gsum pas// dpral ba'i haM zhes bya ba ni// mi shigs pa'i thig le'o// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi dag dang // thun bzhis byin 
326a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs pa yis// skad cig bzhi ni 'byung ba dang // dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis// sbyar ba bzhi yi sngon du'o// mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// bya dang byed pa'i dngos po min// rdo rje sems dpa'i 
326a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis ni// 'dir ni ji ltar bde bar rol// pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po yang // phyogs bzhir rnam par gnas pa ni// 'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa yin te// mar me lta bu'i rang bzhin no// mtshams su rnam par gnas pa'i tshe// / 
326a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi nang song bzhi po yang // de nas bdud rtsi lnga 'bab pa// de nyid rang bzhin med tshul gyis// 'dir ni mchod pa'i tshul gnas pas// mchod pa bzhin du yang dag bshad// lus kyi snying gi nang na ni// rtsa rnams 
326a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ni rnam par gnas// gzhan yang sku gsung thugs dbye bas// nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang dag bshad// gnas sogs dbye ba la brten te// gnas dang gnas la rnam par gnas// ltung byed la sogs rnam dag pa// 
326a8(rgyud 'grel): khwa gdong la sogs sngar ji bzhin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rgyas btab pa'i phyir gsungs so// rdzas bcu las ni sngar bsam pa// yi ge a las byung ba'i snod// rlung gi me yi dkyil 'khor la// sbar 
326b1(rgyud 'grel): bas 'khor bar gyur pa dang // dbyangs yig dang po yang dag ldan// skad cig de las 'bar zhing blta// bzlog pa'i yi ge mnyam sbyor ba// rgyud kyi sngags ni bsgom par bya// yi ge oM gyis kun gsal bas// de nyid
326b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum la yang dag brjod// de ltar bsgom gyur na lha mo// rdzas kyi dngos grub bzang po byed// 'di yi rnal 'byor dngos grub ni// byin gyis rlab par yang dag 'gyur// oM a ral+li dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM// oM 
326b3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra DA ki ni/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ i maM ba li b+huny+dza tha pi ba tha ma ma karma sA d+ha ya tha oM aHhUM pheM pheM swA hA/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te bI re shA ya/ ma hA kalpAg+ni saM ni b+hA ya/ dza TA ma ku Tot+ka TA ya/ diSh+Ta ka rA lo gra b+hi ShaM na mu khA 
326b4(rgyud 'grel): ya/ sa ha sra b+ha su rA ya/ pa ra shu pA sho d+hA ta shu la kha T+wAM ga d+hA ri Ne/ byap+pa dzi nam+ba rad+hA rA ya/ ma hA d+hAn+man+tu ka ra wa pu ShA ya/ oM ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hr-i hr-i/ hraH 
326b5(rgyud 'grel): drahrar+thapaM pau/ phaT phaT/ dahad ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi rAn+ta mA lA pa laM bi ne/ gr-in+tagr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM gaM saR+Wa bA/ tardza yaM tardza ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kan+d+ha tsi sr-i dz+nye dz+ha/ k+ShAk+tAM ha ha/ hi haM/ 
326b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM nAM/ kI li ki li/ si li si laM/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi la/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sngags thams cad kyi mtha' ru bru~M dang phaT n+yes bya ba'i yi ge sbyar ro// rab tug tu ma mo la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro/

326b8(rgyud 'grel): subyA hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na grah+Na hi hrI phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya/ gr-ihA pa ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bI badz+ra rA dza hu~M hU~M phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ya~M/ badz+ra widz+nyA nI ye hu~M hUM phaT swA hA bam 
327a1(rgyud 'grel): oM bi ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM tsau rI hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// rje btsun ma'i rkang pa'i sngags so// oM ha na ma hi/ sA hA hu/ bo Sha Ta he hU~M hU~M ho// phaT haM/ dpa' bo'i go cha drug go// 
327a2(rgyud 'grel): oM baM haM yaM hI maM hreM hAM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ yi ge oM ni thams cad du ste/ rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha'o// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
327a3(rgyud 'grel): / bdam tshaga' ba'i dkyil bang kyi tshig zugs/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wAn shI tsakra saM ba ra maN+Da la bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ bcom 
327a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'gro ba'i mgon// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med la// phyag 'tshal dkyil 'khor spyod pa dang // brtul zhugs rim pa bsnyen pa bshad// 
327a5(rgyud 'grel): lugs su byung dang bzlog pa dang // tha dad phyi ni sbas pa dag/ shes nas gang yang cho ga 'di// bdag gi thams cad bshad par bya// sgra dang sgra nyams brda dang ni// sdeb sbyor mtshan nyid spangs pa yi// 'khor lo mchod
327a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga gsal// de ni bdag nyid ngan phyir dang // gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs 'dra ba'i// phyi rol bstan bcos sun 'byin pa// don la rtog pa de nyid can// spyod dang thar pa'ang rang dga' yin// legs par brtags pa'i slob 
327a7(rgyud 'grel): ma la// slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri// 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang // snying rje la sogs phan sems ldan// thos dang klog la mngon par brtson// gsang ba'i cho ga lhag par dang // rtag par rgyun du bla ma gus// slob ma 
327a8(rgyud 'grel): de ni yongs su bzung // de ni dngos grub ma lus pa// sgrub byed ye shes bshad bya ste// lha ni mnyes par ma byas na// bdag nyid rnam par sun 'byin yin// dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'khor lo yis// sngags rnams 
327b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par rab dad cig/ dpa' bo'i snying po'i gsang sngags ni// khri drug gsum du bzlas brjod bya// rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo yi// khri phrag nyis ni bsnyen par bya// kA ka'i gdong sogs rnam pa brgyad/ 
327b2(rgyud 'grel): snying po rnal 'byor ma bzhi yi// stong phrag lnga dang lnga brgya ni// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ste// bdag gi yang na dkyil 'khor ni// sngon du bsnyen pas 'grub par 'gyur// gang 'dir rjes gnang dbang bskur ba'i// bla ma'i 
327b3(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo bri bya zhing // 'khor lo'i yo byad phun tshogs pa'i// slob mas de la gsol ba gdab// 'khor lo mchod pa'i rim ji bzhin// khyod kyis thams cad 'byor gyur te// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dga' bar// 
327b4(rgyud 'grel): gus pa yis ni byed nus sam// gal te dpa' bo thams cad du// gzi brjid can byed nus smra ba// de nas dpa' bo chen pos 'dir// shes rab yan lag gnyis med lus// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// 
327b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo kun la rnam par bzhugs// dang po gnas ni khyad par du// de las 'bad pas btsal bar bya// sems can don bya'i chu ru ni// bdag gis byang chub de la bdag/ da ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// yon tan gnas ni/ 
327b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya ste// shin tu bgrod par dka' ba yi// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// ro langs dang ni srin po rnams// mi bzad 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa// yi ge pheM gi sgras khyab pa'am// sgrub pa po dang mtshams phyogs su// 
327b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs bral yongs su dag pa'i blos// ma lus rnam rtog bral ba yis// byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis ni// 'dres med rnal 'byor pa der gnas// sems can gcig tu gdug cing gtum// sdug bsngal dang ni las kyis 
327b8(rgyud 'grel): gzir// stong dang snying rje'i snying po yis// byang chub la bzhag yid la bya// kye ma sems can sdug bsngal zhing // kun rtog la ni mngon par zhen// de yi rtog pa gzhom phyir bdag/ dpal ldan he ru ka rang bya// sngon du/ 
328a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// gnas las langs pa nyid dang ni// 'jug dang rdzogs pa nyid dag dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa nye bar bsdu// yang dag ye shes rgyud shes 
328a2(rgyud 'grel): shing // he ru ka dpal gsang sngags shes// khro ba med cing gtsang la mkhas// sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs cha lugs// bdag nyid sngon du byed bdag ni// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// 
328a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i ye shes rnam par spangs// dman la mos pa'i sems can rnams// mthong nas slob dpon tshul la gnas// sems can gdon par bya'o zhes// snying rjes non pa'i sems dang ldan// de bas he ru ka rnal 'byor// 
328a4(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog mgon po bdag ston no// dam tshig skyong zhing brten byed pa// bu khyod cig spro gyur tam// he ru ka dpal tshul 'di la// bza' dang bsrung la brten pa dang // skye bo mang po'i sdig pa ni// bsags pas rnam par 
328a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig byed pa// dpa' bo 'khor lo sdom pa yi// sdom pa so sor bsrung bar bgyi// slob mas gsol ba'o// de nas 'dir ni dpa' bo ches// sngon du spyod pa byas nas ni// da ni sems can bsgral bya zhing // dga' ba'i
328a6(rgyud 'grel): sems ni sngon du bya// 'khor lo bde mchog dpal rnal 'byor// rgyud kyi tshogs lha rnams ni// mnyes byas dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing // sa yang yongs su brtag par bya// ri dang nags dang sman ljongs dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 
328a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gram dang ni// sngon nas grub pa'i dur khrod dang // yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs dang // gang yang sems ni 'jug pa dang // mdzes shing yid ni dga' ba ru// chu dang ba lang lcibs byugs// me tog sna tshogs rnam par dgram 
328a8(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar ma dang / dri ni chu dang bcas par byugs// de la sogs pa mnye ba dang // kun tu rgya cher brdung ba dang // shar dang byang du gzhol bas na// sngags pa rnams ni dngos grub 'grub// dbus su mtho 
328b1(rgyud 'grel): bas rgyal srid dam// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dag thob// byang du mtho bas 'chi 'gyur zhing // nor rnams rab tu 'jig par byed// ji skad bshad pas shar mtho bas// rigs rnams rab tu bzang bar byed// dbus su dma' 
328b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin gang // sgrub pa po ni 'jom dang ldan// de ltar mtshan nyid bcas pa yis// dpa' bo'i dbang po sogs pas mtshan// sa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o// // de ltar sbyangs pa byas mdzes pa'i// sa yi 
328b3(rgyud 'grel): dbum su 'dug nas su// mdzes dkar ma mo zhes byin// bskul bas 'di yis gsol ba gdab// dang por sgra la sogapa sngon gyis// rnal 'byor dmigs pa thams cad du// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// gnyis 
328b4(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes la legs gnas// sa la reg pa'i phyag rgya dang // mi shigs thig ler byas pa yis// so mos lan gsum bsnun pa ni// bkug gnas mdun du 'dug par bsam// yan lag rgyan rnams thams cad dang // 
328b5(rgyud 'grel): kha dog ser po legs par mdzes// lag na bum pa thogs nas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra// mchod yod rkang pa dkrug sogs byin la// gzi brjid can de 'di ltar bya// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 
328b6(rgyud 'grel): spyong pa'i chus dang khyad par gyi// sa dang par la phyin pa la// l+h+wa ma kyad ni dbang du gung// shAkya seMngags sgrub pa yis// dzaskar bdud ni sde tsamag// ded bzhin bdag gis bdud rtsi las// rgyal bar byas nas kyi 
328b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bri// de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni// der ni thim par rnam par bsam// sa bsrang ba'o// mgul rgyan gdu burna rgyan dang // spyi bor nor bus rnam par brgyan// mchod phyir thogs rgya thal pa yi// 
328b8(rgyud 'grel): rgya yi sa yan lag kun nas brgyan// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// sgom nas bgegs rnams bsal bar bya// de nas rkang pa gnyis su yi ge hUM las 'bar ba'i rdo rje bsam la/ mig gnyis su ma dang Ta 
329a1(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba dang / nyi ma bsam te/ rdo rje lta bas thams cad du bltas la/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu gzung zhing / g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor ba la 'bad de/ kha T+wAM ga la legs par khyud 
329a2(rgyud 'grel): nas de ni gnas pa 'dis bskrad par bya'o// sa phyogs 'dir sems can gyi don rtsom gyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / srin po dang / srin mo la sogs pa gang

333a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab yan lag gnyis med 'du// zhal bzhi zhal re spyan gsum pa// mgo dang dum bus rnam par brgyan// ljang dang dmar dang de bzhin ser// phyag ni bcu gnyis yang dag ldan// g.yas rkyang ba yi rnam

333a6(rgyud 'grel): pang na gnas pa'i phag mo ni// phyag gis 'khyud par mdzad pa las// gdug pa bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing // zhal nas khrag gis rgyun mdzag pa// khrag chen gyis byugs sku yan lag/ chags dang 
333a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas shing skra grol ba// zod pa'i phreng bas bcings pa yin// ha he zhes bzhad spyan gsum sku// dum bu dang ni thod pas brgyan// g.yas na sdigs mdzub rdo rje ste// bdud sogs kun la sdigs par mdzad// 
333a8(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro me ni mA ma kI// mdun gyi 'dab ma gnon par bzhugs// phyag bzhi sgra ni grol ba la// rtse mo lnga yis rnam brgyan pa// phyag rgya lnga sogs sku la mnga'// spyan gsum khro bo hU~M mdzad cing // 
333b1(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sngo la 'jigs pa che// ha ha zhes ni 'jigs par mdzad// zod pa'i cod pan lnga pa ste// dbu skra grol zhing 'jigs par mdzad// kha T+wAM ga brten thod pa bsnams// rnal 'byor mtshon cha Da ma ru 
333b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas// phyag bzhi pas ni rnam par brgyan// g.yon nas bskor ba'i pad+ma la// lA ma zhes bya sgrol mdzad ma'o// sku mdog ljang gu 'jigs pa che// ha ha zhes bzhad gtsigs pa po// rtse bran lngas ni 
333b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa ste// dbu skra grol zhing 'jigs mdzad pa// spyan gsum pa la hUM mdzad cing // kha T+wAM ga brten thod pa bsnams// rnal 'byor mtshon dang Da ma ru// phyag bzhi pas ni rnam par brgyan// khaN+Da ro 
333b4(rgyud 'grel): ni gos dkar mo// byang gi 'dab ma gnon pas bzhugs// sku mdog dmar mo shas cher 'bar// phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i hUM mdzad pa// dbu skra grol zhing 'bar ba la// rtsi bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan// 
333b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor snod dang kha T+wAM ga/ rnal 'byor mtshon dang Da ma ru// phyag rgya lngas ni brgyan pa dang // spyan gsum 'og pa ga dag gis brgyan// nub kyi 'dab mar gzugs can ma// sku mdog ser zhing cher 'bar/ 
333b6(rgyud 'grel): ba// ha ha zhes bzhad 'jigs par mdzad// skra grol kha T+wAM ga dang bcas// phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum hUM gis 'jigs par mdzad// rtse bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya 
333b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga sogs sku la mnga'// rnal 'byor mtshon pa snod rnams la'o// chu dang me dang rlung dang ni// sa yi khams bdag nyid yin no// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi po// phyi dang nang na yang dag bzhugs// mtshams 
333b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi cha yi pad+ma la// ma dang de bzhin pa dag dang // rgyal po dang ni rgyal rigs gnyis// mgo bo'i snod ni mchod byed pa// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ma// bu la sogs pas yang dag drangs// 
334a1(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste 'khor lo'i nang du bzhugs// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mchod// de la bu skyes rnal 'byor ma'i// 'khor lo'i gnas ni bshad bya ste// bu shes bya ba ni pul+li ra ma la ya ste/ 
334a2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'i dum bu can dang // rab gtam ma'o// dza zhes bya ba ri dz+wa lan+d+ha ste// keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig pa'o// oM zhes bya ba ni uD+yan te// keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma'o// a zhes bya 
334a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni arba tu ste/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang // pa chen ma'o// de dag ni gnas so// go zhes bya ba ni go dA bi ri ste/ lha dgra dang / brtan pa'i blo can pa'o// rA zhes bya ba na rA pe shwa re ste// 'od 
334a4(rgyud 'grel): dpag med dang / me 'brang ma'o// de zhes zla ba ni dad bi ko Ta he/ rdo rje 'ad dang le ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// mA zhes bya ba ni pA la ba ste/ rdo rje'i sku dang / shing grub ma'o// de dag ni nye ba'i gnas yin la/ 
334a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi 'bar lo ste/ nam mkha' la chub yin no// / kA zhes bya ri k+Sha ma ru ba ste/ myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma'o// oM zhes bya ba ni e Te ste/ rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o// 
334a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni zhing ngo // tri zhes bya ba ni tri sha ku ne ste/ dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o// ko zhes bya ba ko sa la ste/ rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ba'o// de dag ni nye ba'i zhing ngo // kazhes bya ba ni/ 
334a7(rgyud 'grel): lani ste/ rab bzang po dang / mdog lda ma 'o/ la zhes bya ba ni la prA ka ste/ rdo rje bzang po dang / shir tu bzang mo'o// de dag ri tsan+do ta'o// ka zhis bya ba ni kany+tsi ste/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnga ma'o// haM zhes 
334a8(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni hi mA la ya te/ mge mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma'o// de dag ni u pa tsan+d+ra ha yin pas gsung gi 'khor lo ste sa la d+hU ba yid no// pra zhes bya ba pre ta pu raM ste/ stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs 
334b1(rgyud 'grel): can ma'o// gr-i zhes bya ba ni gr-i ha de ba ste/ rin chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma'o// de dag ni 'dus pa zhes bya'o// sau zhes bya ba sau rASh+Ta ste/ rta mgrin dang / shaut+te ni'o// su zhes bya ba ni su war+N+Na dI pa ste// 
334b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i gon ma'o// de dag ni nye bo'i 'dus pa can no// na zhes bya ba ni na ga ra ste/ dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' mo'o// sa zhes bya ba ni sin+ni ste/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang 
334b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o// de dag ni dur khrod de/ ma zhes bya ba ni ma ru de sha ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// ku zhes bya ba ni ku lu ta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' brtson 'grus 
334b4(rgyud 'grel): chen mo'o// de dag ni nye ba'i dur khrod do// sgra'i 'khor lo ste sa 'og na gnas pa yin no// sgo rnams ni khwa gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong can ma dang / khyi'i dong can ma dang / phag gdong can ma'o// mtshams rnam 
334b5(rgyud 'grel): su ni gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma'o// grub pa'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// phyogs kun tu ni rnam par gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// sa bcu 
334b6(rgyud 'grel): la ni rnam par bzhugs// he ru ka dpal rgyal po che phyi dang nang du yang dag bzhugs// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' du ma'o// dkyil 'khor du lha dgod pa'o// 
334b7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dang / sgo srungs brgyad po gtogs pa/ 'khor lo gsum la thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa rnams ni phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang dar gyis 
334b8(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang spyi gtsug gi nor bu dang ldan pa 'og bag gis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pas/ rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa/ lha mo la gzigs shing sgros 'dzin pa'o// 
335a1(rgyud 'grel): / rab tu gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni/ rang gi bdag po'i sku mdog dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa ste/ dbu skra grol bas rnam brgyan pa// thod pa dang ni 'khyud 
335a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // gri grag dang ni sdigs mdzub can// spyan gsum hA gis 'jigs par byed// rtse bran du ma bus rnam par brgyad// mkha' 'gro ma sogs thams cad kyang // g.yon nas skor ba sngon 'gro ba// 
335a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang me chu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'gro kun g.yon nas 'byung ba yin// dkar mir dkar dang dmar po ni// tha ma mchog dang bar ma ste// thams cad ji bzhin dgod pa ni// bla ma'i rim gyis drin yin no// khral 
335a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa brgyad po ni// mkha' 'grol sogs dbye ba yis// zhabs kyis rol gnon pa dang // sna chags gzugs can bzhi pa yin// thams cad khrab rnam rgyal sogs// rnal 'byor ma brgyad sprul pa yin/ 
335a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mtshan pa'i kha T+wAM ga/ pad+ma'i snod ni lnga can te// g.yas pas mtshon cha 'char ba ni// gdug pa thams cad nges gnon pa'o// dpal ldan he ru ka sogs kun// g.yon gyis 'khyud cing nu ma 'dzin// lha 
335a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi phyag dang / sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan te/ byang chub kyi yan lag sum cu rtsa bdun du byas pa'o// // na da'i gzugs sogs sngon du 'gro ba dang / gos dang / phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang / shes rab 
335a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi yan lag dang / phur bu dang / dra ba dang / A li kA laM zhes brjod nas// chu sogs rtog pa sngon 'gro ba// 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i rim gyis so// 'bad pa yas te de bzhin du/ 
335a8(rgyud 'grel): shes rab yan lag bstan gyi ste// mgu la rgyan gtsug tor dbu rgyan dang // rna rgyan tshangs pa'i srad bu dang // mgul bar rgyan bcings mgo bor phreng // ska rags dang ni sil khrol sgra// ral pa cod par dang 
335b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// bcos ma'i sgra yis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje pad+ma kha T+wA~M bcas// rnge'u chung sgra dang hUM sgrogs shing // dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// go cha gsum gyis brgyan pa yin// he ruka dpal dpa' bo 
335b2(rgyud 'grel): tshe// rang gi bdag nyid gcig tu byas// sems can kun la rjes brtse ba'i// blo ldan bum pa mngon par bzlas// bum pa mchog ni bcu dag tu// de nyid kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// chu ni 'o mar yang dag 
335b3(rgyud 'grel): bzla// chu chen chu chung bum pa dag/ dri dang me tog sna tshogs pas// dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar ma yis// dri la chus ni yang dag drug/ kha ni 'dab mas yang dag brgyan// sangs rgyas kun gyis ma 
335b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grom// cho ga bzhin du mngon par bzlas// mgul ba gos kyis rnam dkris shing // rgyan ni mdzes pas rnam par brgyan// me tog phreng gis kun bskor ba// brgyad pa dag na sgo rung dag// bum pa dag 
335b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dbus su'o// ma dang de bzhin pa dag dang // rgyal po rgyal rigs gnyis g+ha ni// bum pa chus ni rab tu dgang // kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyis ni// brgyan cing mgul ba dkri bar bya// sna tshogs 'dabams kha dag 
335b6(rgyud 'grel): rang byung ma tog dag gis mchod// g+ha yi na ya~M lags san// ri ma'i dbus smra bzhag par // bzla ni b+ha zhing // datshogs pa yigs kyang bri// rgyal mtshan gdags sogs dang rnams 
335b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang / nas su rnam par bcan// bum pa bzhag nas mchod pa ni// dza~M ska bshad pa bzhin duH// rin chen pa sed kyis mdzes par ni// dkyil 'khor kun tu gtong bar bya// spos snod dag ni brgyad po dang / 
335b8(rgyud 'grel): mar me'i sdong bu de mnyam bya// ti la mar chen por rab sbar la// spos ni lnga po sngon 'gro ba'o// sna tshags me tog 'byung ba dang // sna tshags chad dang tha ba dang // rol mi dag gis rab bkang zhing // sna tshogs 
336a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma spang na// dri bzang me tog sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs pa yi glu len cing // sna tshogs gar gyi gar bzang byed// bkra shis sgra ni sna tshogs pa'i// dga' ston shrI he ru ka yi// 
336a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa dang ni 'gro ba'i gnas// 'dod pa rnal 'byor ma yaM laM// blo bzhi dag tu rnal 'byor ma// dpa' bo gnyis me de dag gis mtshan// tshon chen la sogs gos dag gam// dar la sogs pa dag gis brgyan// phyag rgya 
336a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga la sogs pa'i lus// rtse bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud// sgo brgyad dag tu kha sbyor ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo bdag po kun// 'khor lo skur ba'i rnal 'byor yin// sngar bshad rgyan 
336a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan pa dang // stan dang gnas ni rnams mdzes par// dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'phyang // 'khyud cing du ma'i tshir ba dang // steng gi mgo bo spyi gtsug dang // mig sogs gos chas rnam par brgyan/ rdo rje 
336a5(rgyud 'grel): sems sogs byin brlabs la// rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med gnas// byang chub yan lag sum cu bdun// byas shing go bgos mnyam par bzhag/ de ltar go bgos bdag nyid ni// sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shig/ 
336a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang dpa' mo dang dpa' mo rnams la mchod pa'o// rang zhid ji ltar grub par ni// ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// bdag nyid la sbyar byas pa yis// dam tshig la ni gzhug par bya// dang por 
336a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs phyag rgya yis// gyen du pho gi sgra bsgrags la// mchog dang bar ma'i rnal 'byor ma// 'jig rten khams la sogs pas dgug/ rang zhing sku mdog phyag mtshan dbyibs// sngar bshad pa yi rgyan dang ldan// rang gi phyag

336b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo spyan drang ba'o// // te ruka dpal sogs 'khor lo'i// lha rnams kyi dang nang gis mchod// lha yi grangs bzhi blo ldan pas// mdzes pa'i gos kyang dbul bar bya// 'khor lo sgyur dang dpa' bo ni//

336b3(rgyud 'grel): bad pa pa gas// nga na ma sa na sa pa // thug sa ma thas pad du// sa rbA zhes twA / rkyen gyis ba sa lama'am 
336b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod// dkyil 'khor / rnams mnyes par bya// dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'o// / bya ba'i mchod pa'i byad pa ni// b+ha ra tis tig bri ste// ki shig kya dang a ba di// gar rnams kun gyis gar bya'o// 
336b5(rgyud 'grel): chags bcas mngon stor tshul gyis ni// dam par 'gyur bas rnam rol cing // sgeg dang bcas pa'i gom stobs kyis// gom skabs brgyad kyigar bya'o// 'thud sogs bya bkun dang ni// 'byud cing num bci bdang / 
336b6(rgyud 'grel): da po rnal 'byor ma mnyes bya// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis// skye bo dam pa kun 'dus bya// he ru ka dpal rgyal po che// mdza' ba thams cad yang dag 'dus// zhi ba'i tshul dngos grub ni// dam pa'i gnas na 
336b7(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa 'grub// rgyan chags la sogs thams cad dang // bza' ba zhim po sna tshogs dang // sha rlon dag gis byed par du// sngags dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya// oM sarba badz+ra kA ma~M na~M b+haSh+Ta sho d+ha ya gra h+Na badz+rI

337a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rjes mthun par// lha yi bdag nyid dngos byas la// tshogs sbyin sreg kun byas na// brtag mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur// bza' 'am yang na btung ba dag/ brtul zhugs can ni 
337a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang bar ma'i dbugs dbyung ba// bsam pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ bdag nyid lha ni lha yi mchog/ bdag nyid lha ni lha dam pa// bdag gi gzugs la ma chags la// gzugs brnyan la sogs 
337a3(rgyud 'grel): lta bur shes// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo kun gyi gnas yin te// de las 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid he ru ka dpal mchod// de ltar 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dge ba yongs su/ 
337a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par 'gyur// las tshogs gang zhig bsams pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dpal 'khor las kyi nang gi sbyin sreg go/ drug cupa sogs bzar bcas pa'i// zan dron sha dang nya sha dang //

337b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi// de ltar phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg bya/ gtor ma'i bya ba dang / mchod pa'i bya ba'i las ma lus par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas slob ma ma lus pa'i

338a1(rgyud 'grel): / bgyi// de nas lho phyogs kyi sgor mngon du phyogs par byas la// oM na ma ste hUM/ na mA mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA// zhes bya bas sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas lan gsum phyag 
338a2(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ oM sarba bI ra ya~M gi ni pU dza ba s+than ya At+ma nano d+ya trA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yau ge ni At+ma ni badz+rA nA ga ni oM d+hitiSh+Tha swA mAM/ zhes bye bas lus thams cad kyis phyag byed du gzhug go// de nas g.yon gyi 
338a3(rgyud 'grel): su de snying gar thal mo sbyor du bcug la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni pU dza a b+hi She ka At+ma da~M nir+ya ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yau gi naM a ta ma ne badz+ra lA mi rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ de nas byang phyogs kyi sgor thal mo de nyid 
338a4(rgyud 'grel): dpral bar bzhag la phyag byed du gzhug ste/ oM sarba bA ri yo gi ni pU dza pra brta na ya At+ma naM nir+yata yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni at+ma na badz+ra khaN+Da ro ha r+ya pra brta ya mAM/ de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor thal mo de nyid mgor bzhag la 
338a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag byed du gzhug ste/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni pU dza karma ka ra Na ya at+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni At+ma badz+ra rU pi Nir+ya karma ka ru mAM/ phyag bzhi'o// de nas lhor ni phyags byas te/ slob ma'i lag nas bzung 
338a6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// bde mchog sdom pa'i cho ga bzhin// thams cad brjod de sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs 'ongs pa'i// sdom pa brtan par gyur 
338a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes grags so// slob dpon khyod kyis bzung bya ste// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje 
338a8(rgyud 'grel): rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad// rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni// nyin re bzhin yang lan drug tu// chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// / 
338b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus bzung // 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o// las kyi rigs mchog can pal// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa 
338b2(rgyud 'grel): las kyang ci nus bya// rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi ni// gang phyir drud las gsungs pa rnams// blo chen khyod kyis rtag tu ni// dngos grub phyir ni bsrung bar bya// dam tshig bsgrag pa'o// slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson/ 
338b3(rgyud 'grel): gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni tha med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// 
338b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byeng tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// 
338b5(rgyud 'grel): blan med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// de nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi// nam du yang ni mi btang ngo // rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag r+b+ha yang // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang 
338b6(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bgyi// rin cheni rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin de bzhin du dus drug du// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang 
338b7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos ni bzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang bdag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci dus bgyi// byang chub sems 
338b8(rgyud 'grel): ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung // ma sgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi/ dbugs ma byung ba dbugs 
339a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// sdom pa gzung ba'o// deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis// ngas khyod la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed 
339a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba 
339a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ dam tshid nyams par gyur ta re/ he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi snying la yang dag gzhug par gyur// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// de nas dam tshig blud pa ni// / 
339a4(rgyud 'grel): ga bur tsan dan ldan pa dang // bde ba'i me tog tshur bcas pa// sangs rgyas kun dang mkha' 'gro ma'i// slob ma blo gros brtan pa la// blangs te rgyan gyis de la sbyin// thod pa legs par sbyang nas ni// gzi mdang 
339a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa 'di skad brjod// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'thob// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i to da ka dzaHhUM/ deng nas brtsams/ 
339a6(rgyud 'grel): te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga nyid yin gyis/ gang 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya'o// khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ta re/ de nas dpa' bo dang / 
339a7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs shig/ dpal he ru ka bdag la 'bab par mdzad cig ces smrar gzhug go/ thang chu lnga rtsi legs sbyar ba'i// bskus shing gos ni legs bdungs dang // byi la'i rtug pa nyid dang ni/ 
339a8(rgyud 'grel): gu gul lhan cig sbyar nas ni// pad+ma'i snod du gzhag nas su// yi dgas me yis gdung bar bya// gnyis med gnyis med sngags kyis ni// 'gyings bcas 'dug ste gzi ldan pa// sngar bshad rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 
339b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin go cha bgos nas ni// 'khor lo kun gyi dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma rnams de snying gzhug/ g.yas brkyang ba la legs bsdams pas// gnyis med sngags ni brjod nas ni// gdug pa de dang gsang sngag 
339b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis// skad cig de nyid dag la 'jug/ oM tiSh+Tha ma hA gro d+ha A be sha hUM/ oM shrI he ru kA ya bi dA he bid+yA rA dzA ya d+hi ma te swA hA/ zhes bya ba 'dis dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o// de nas lag pa gzung ba yis// mig phye 
339b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni blta bar bya// he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyis// mig 'byed pa rin brtson par mdzad// oM badz+ra Ni tra ya a pa ha ra be Ta laM hrIHdkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni dang ba rab tu bskyed// khyod ni rnal 'byor ma 
339b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang // dngos grub phran tshegs khyod mngon 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang // gsang sngags la yang brtson par 
339b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis// gang du me tog lhur gyur pa// de yi gnas sogs bstan par bya// slob ma gzhug pa'o// // sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar bzhugs// gnyis med gnyis med pa ngan gnas// brtan g.yo kun gyi bdag nyid 
339b6(rgyud 'grel): can// spyod dang grol ba rab stsol ba// kun mkhyen kun mdzad gtso bo ste// dpa' bo che la bu khyod ltos// rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa'i tshogs// grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma lnga po// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs kun// 
339b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo mkha' la spyod pas bskor// rab gtum mo sogs yang dag 'khyud// gnyis po thugs kyi sprul pa yin// myu gu can la sogs pa kun// rnal 'byor ma brgyad gnyis su med// gsung ni rnam dag po/ 
339b8(rgyud 'grel): bo yis// mi yi 'jig rten dag tu khyab// stobs po che sogs par gnas pa// grub pas sa 'og gnas pa yin// sku'i sprul par bshad pa ste// chags pa kun gyi rjes su chags// he ru ka dpal sogs 'khor// 
340a1(rgyud 'grel): la// g.yon nas 'khyud cing nu ma 'dzin// sku gsum zhes bya'i sprul pa ste// 'bring dang mchog dang tha ma'o// khwa la sogs pa brgyad pa yi// gzugs ni sku yis yang dag bstan// khro bo 
340a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal la sogs brgyad// byang chub sum du rtsa bdun sprul// mkha' la spyod dang sil spyod// sa 'og dag gis mamo brgyad// brgyad gnyis mchod pa'i lha mo yis// lha rnams de nyid mtshan pa yin// 
340a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do// // de nas slob ma bla ma yaM// zhabs la dad pas phyag 'tshal te// thal sbyar yon ni phul ba yis// dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab// he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba// 
340a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba skyob phyir gzi brjid can// ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs// de bzhin bdag la de stsol cig/ dpa' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i// dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol// sems can kun gyi dan gyi 
340a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid// 'jug pa sgo yi lha phyogs su// he ru ka dpal bdag nyid sems// pad+ma 'dab brgyad steng du ni// seng ge'i khri sogs la bzhag ste// slob ma gnyis med sbyar

340a8(rgyud 'grel): bkrags sgra yis gang ba yis// grul na ra la ma snyan pa yis// ta draHdpal bdag nyidagal// rab tu 'bad de mchen par bya// dbang bkru sa gsal ba'o// rnal 'byor pa yis spangs sa 
340b1(rgyud 'grel): ni// chog bzhin du yongs bzlas pas// gsang sngags brjod cing bdag pa ste// he rAka dpal sogs gnyis med// bzlas nas dkyil 'khar thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor glu yis klu len cing // gnyis med 
340b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gzugs pa rnams// thams cad chog bzhin dbang bsgyur // yang na thar gyi chog yis// rnam rgyal bum par brdeg par bya// 'dab ma'i rtse mos blangs nas ni// sngam bzhin du dbang bskur zhing // gsang sngags /

340b7(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs klu yis ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sogs kun// bsgoms la thams cad dbang bskur ro// chu yis dbang bskur byid pa yis// sdig pa thams cad bkru bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje rgya gram mgor// ral pa'i bor chub 
340b8(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yis// dar dbyangs dbang bskur byin par bya// oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra wata nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA// zhes brjod la 'khor lo thams cad kyi dpa' bo la sogs pa brjod do// sngags 
341a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi bskul ba'o// lag tu nga mtshan de nyid dang // mtshan ma'i dbang bsar skyen par bya// TharA/ dpal dbang bskung bas// dering khyod ni dbang bskung bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de// rab tu 
341a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub byi rdo rje long // de nas 'di rang gi mtshan ma'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya ste/ oM bti rug yo pa te s+t+rai a te/ tsu ma ti Sh+Tha te thA hrI nga sa ma ya s+t+waM/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' di// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba re// @na 
341a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje skems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ rdo rje'o// 'di ri rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ 
341a4(rgyud 'grel): srid pang po nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ne// sred pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// dril bu'o// rdo rje dril bu yang dga' khyud// g.yon pasnyems pa dang spos gnon 'chang /

341a6(rgyud 'grel): / 'i pas mang she byen ra// 'anas mas nas dang/ dpal phyug nags/ sa ga sa// dpal ba la zugs 
341a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+he badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra yA mi hU~M ha ha ha ha ho/ rdo rje'i brtul bzhugs so// // kha T+wAM ga dang Da ma ru bzung ste// he ru ka dpal kha T+wA~M ga/ rnal 'byor ma nai Da ma ru// rdo rje kha T+wA~M rdo rje bcas/

343a7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma 'dra// dpa' bo rig dang bla ma la// mchod pa'i 'bras bu mnyam pa yis// slob dpon gyi ni yon yin no// de bas 'dir ni mdor bsdus nas// me tog ldan zhing shin tu bslabs// shin tu gsang ba'i sa phyogs ni// 
343a8(rgyud 'grel): khams lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// bye mar byas te de thams cad// rdo rje lam du byug par bya// kun tu dga' la sogs pa bzhi// 'khor lo kun bdag rnal 'byor ldan// 'dod chags chos las byung ba'i mgon// 
343b1(rgyud 'grel): chags pa kun gyis rjes chags pas// pad+ma'i snod du lag bzhag ste// rnal 'byor ma ni 'di skad smra// bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // dmangs rigs thar gnas bud med kun// gus dang bcas pas mchod pa dang // / 
343b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med tshul gyis tsam pa na// dpa' bo khyod ni spro gyur tam// smras shig dpa' bo bde ba che// ci gsungs dam tshig bsten par ni// lha mo bdag gis byed par nus// pad+ma bi ga satwe kr-i muk+te ke shi bi ba sre ke me tog 
343b3(rgyud 'grel): tshur ldan dpa' bo yis// rnal 'byor ma la rdo rje sbyin// de nas brtsams te bu khyod ni// brtul zhugs bzang pos 'gro don gyis// bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // dmangs rigs tha ma dag spyad cing // b+ha ga pad+mar
343b4(rgyud 'grel): tsum+ban// bdud rtsi ldan bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi rkang g.yon ni// lung bsgo bar ni spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje rnal 'byor mdapa' bo// gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la// dpa' bo las byung byang chub sems// 
343b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gyis dbang ni bskur bar bya// 'di ni byang chub 'grub rnal 'byor// khams lnga bcud kyi bdag nyid can// he ru ka dpal bdag sbyor bas// yang dag bde ba myong bar gyis// gnyis med ye shes dbang bskur ni/ 
343b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba kun la sogs par bshad// 'di dag thams cad gsal ba che// dbang bskur ba ni mchog gi gnas// yon dang dad pa mngon 'gro bas// der ni phyag rgya gtad par bya// de nas ji skad bshad pa yis// cho gas// 
343b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg las bya zhing // rnal 'byor ma la gtor ma sbyin// mkha' 'gro ma ni mchod 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing sogs zhing rnams la// khyad par du ni sbyin la spyod// dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis 
343b8(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang // bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang 'dra// bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag ni// dge slong gcig dang rab tu sbyar// dge slong stong phrag gnyis dag ni// rdul med pa na gcig dang mnyam// rdul med stong phrag 
344a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dag ni// ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbar// ye shes ldan pa stong phrag gnyis// slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par brtag/ de ltar sbyin pa'i zhing byas nas// blo dang ldan pas brtag tu sbyin// / 
344a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i chos la ni// zhing bzang po la sa bon btab// mtshams med pa dang sdig can yang // tshon rtsi mthong bas grol bar 'gyur// mngon par zhugs pa tsam gyis ni// gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// sbyin 
344a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag bzang po rnal 'byor pa// rim gyis myur du byang chub 'thob// me tog chu yi dbang bskur dang // cod pan rdo rje bdag po dang // ming dang sngags zhugs dang // gnas dang dam tshig spyod pa dang // de bzhin lung bstan dbugs 
344a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyung dang // gsang dang phyag rgya gtad pa dang // dbang bskur 'di rnams thob pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu mchod// dbang bskur ba bcu bzhi pa'o// // g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs su ni// bskor la de nas 'jug 
344a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// longs spyod rdzogs pa gzung na srin// gnyis med ye shes ral bso'o// tshon la sogs pa'i dngos po kun// nang par tho rangs bsdu bar bya// bsdus nas gser gyi bum par ni// bcug nas chu bo chen 
344a6(rgyud 'grel): bor dor// bum pa thams cad bsdus nas ni// sngon bzhin du ni dga' ston bya// de nas bdud rtsi lnga sogs dang // sbyar bas sa ni byug par bya// sngar gyi rdzas kyi lhag ma rnams// gnyis med ye shes sbyin sreg bya// 
344a7(rgyud 'grel): mdza' bo sdug dang rigs mthun bcas// snod zur skye bo gnyis med dang // bkra shis glu yi rnam pa dang // rdo rje dril bus rol pa bya// srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags dul bar ldan// 'od zer sngon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan// 
344a8(rgyud 'grel): rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems dpar ldan// he ru ka dpal sngags pa lhan cig gar byed do// ha ha hi hi hahu hu ho// bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ma chog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog slob dpon chen po brtul zhugs spyod pa/ 
344b1(rgyud 'grel): nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud d+ha shrI shAn+ti dang / lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur/ slad kyi paN+Di ta chen po ga d+ha ra dang / lo tse ba mgos lha btsas kyis bcos de gtan la phab pa'o// 
344b2(rgyud 'grel): yal tshag 'a 'ar pa dkyil 'khor gyi chog bzhugs// #/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'gro ba'i mgon// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med la// phyag 'tshal dkyil 'khor 
344b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa yis// brtul zhugs rim pa'i bsnyen pa bshad// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa dang // mtha' dang spyi ni sbas pa dag/ gang yang shes nas cho ga 'di// bdag gis thams cad bshad par bya// sgra dang sgra nyams brda' 
344b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// sdeb sbyor mtshan nyid spangs pa yi// 'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga gsal// de ni bdag nyid dran phyir bya// phyi rol bstan chos sun 'byin pa// gang gi btang mo 'dra zhing mtshungs// don la rton pa'i don gnyer ba'i// spyod dang 
344b5(rgyud 'grel): thar pa rang dga' yin// legs par brtags pa'i slob ma la// slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri// 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang // snying rje la sogs phan sems ldan// thos dang klog la sogs la rtson// gsang ba'i chos
344b6(rgyud 'grel): la lhag dang ldan// rtag par rgyun du bla ma la gus// slob ma de ni yongs su gzung // de ni dngos grub ma lus pa'i// sgrub byed ye shes bshad bya ste// lha ni mnyes par ma byas// bdag nyid rnam par sun 'byin yin// dpal 
344b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan khrag 'thung sogs 'khor lo'o// sngags rnams mnyes la rab brtson pas// dpa' bo'i snying po'i gsang sngags ni// khri phrag gsum du bzlas brjod bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo'i// khri phrag gnyis ni bsnyen byas 
344b8(rgyud 'grel): shing // bya rog gdong sogs rnam pa brgyad// snying po'i rnal 'byor ma gzhi yi// stong phrag lnga dang lnga brgya ni// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ste// bdag gis ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// sngon du bsnyen pas 'grub par 'gyur/ 
345a1(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod dbang bskur rjes gnang ba'i// bla ma nyid kyis bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i yo byad phun tshogs pa'i// slob mas de la gsol ba gdab// 'khor lo mchod pa'i rim ji bzhin// khyed kyis thams cad 
345a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyur tam// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dga' ba// gus pa yis ni byed nus sam// gal te dpa' bo gzi brjid can// thams cad du byed nus smras nas// de nas dpa' bo chen por 'dir// shes rab yan lag gnyis med 
345a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// 'khor lo kun la rnam par bzhugs// dang po gnas ni khyad par du// de la 'bad pas btsal bar bya// sems can don bya'i d+hA ru ni// bdag gis byang chub la rab gzhag 
345a4(rgyud 'grel): da ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// yon tan gnas ni bshang bya ste// shin bkod dka' dur khrod chen po'i// mi bzad drag shul can/ ro langs dang ni srin po rnams dang yi dgas sgra sgrogs pas/ ces sbyang pi zhes sgra 'byin pa yis 
345a5(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'i sa dag gam/ bsgrub pa po'i yid ni brtan par rung ba'i yul gzhan du/ 'jigs pa dang bral yongs su dag pa'i blos// rnam rtog drab ma lus bsal byas te// byams dang snying rje'i rgyun pa'i lus// 'dres med rnal 
345a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas ni bde bar gnas// sems can gcig du gdug cing drag/ sdug bsngal dang ni las kyis gzer// stong dang snying rje'i snying po yis// byang chub la bzhag yid la bya// kye ma sems can sdug bsngal zhing // kun 
345a7(rgyud 'grel): rtog la ni mngon par zhen// de'i rtog pa gzhom phyir bdang // dpal ldan he ru kar rang bya// sngon du bsnyed pa'i cho ga'o// gnas dang ldang ba nyer dang ni// 'jug dang rdzogs pa nyid dag dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur 
345a8(rgyud 'grel): dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa nye bar bsdu// yang dag ye shes rgyud shes shing // he ru ka dpal gsang sngags shes// khro ba med cing gtsang la brtson// sbyor shes ye shes pha rol son// dpal ldan khrag 'thung yang dag 
345b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// bde zhing rang dbang bdag nyid can// skye ba bye ba stong phrag du// gsang ba'i ye shes kyis bskul ba// dman la mos pa'i sems can rnams// mthong na spyod pa'i tshul la gnas// sems can de dag gdon
345b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o zhes// snying rjes non pa'i sems dang ldan// khrag 'thung dpal zhes brjod pa'i// sdom pa bza' dang ltung ba yi// dam tshig skyong zhing sten byed par// bu khyod ci dga' spro gyur tam// skye dang skye bar sdig bgyis pa/ 
345b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis spyan sngar bshags par bgyi// dpa' bo 'khor lo sdom pa'i// sdom pa so sor sbyang bar bgyi/ slob ma'i gsol ba gdab pa'o// de nas 'dir yang dpa' bo ches// bsnyen phyir sngar sbyar byas nas ni// sems can 
345b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol bar byed don du// dam pa'i sems ni sngon du bya// 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i// rlung chen tshogs lha rnams ni// mnyes bya dkyil 'khor bri bya'i phyir// sa yang yongs su brtag par bya// ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs dang / 
345b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni// sngon du grub pa'i dur khrod dam// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// gang kun sems ni 'jug pa dang // mdzes shing yid ni gang dga' bar// sa lam lhung lci bas byug/ sna tshogs me tog rnam par bkram// 
345b6(rgyud 'grel): bar ma mchog dang dbugs 'byung dang // dri dang chu dang bcas pas mchod// der ni sa la sogs pa mnye// kun tu rgya cher legs par bcag/ shar dang byang du gzhol bar ni// sngags pa rnams kyi dngos grub 'gyur// dbus su mtho bas 
345b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid dam// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dag thob// byang du mtho bas 'chir 'gyur ram// nor rnams rab tu 'jig par byed// ji skad bshad pa'i shar mtho bas// myur du rigs rnams zad par byed// dbus su dma' ba'i mtshan
345b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid gang // sgrub pa po ni 'joms par byed// de ltar mtshan nyid bcas pa yis// dpa' ba dbang pos sogs pas mtshon// sa'i mtshan nyid do// de la sbyar ba mdzes byas pa'i// sa'i dbus su 'dug nas su// nor 'dzin/ 
346a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'i ma mo ni// bskul la 'di yis gsol ba gdab// dang po sgra sogs sngon gyi ni// rnal 'byor dmigs la thams cad bsdu// dpal ldan khrag 'azung rnal 'byor che// gnyis med ye shes la legs/ 
346a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// sa la reg pa'i phyag rgya dang // mi shig thig ler bcas pa yi// sor mo lan gsum bsnun nas ni// bkug nas mdun du 'dug par bsam// yan lag rgyan rnams thams cad dang // kha dog ser pos legs par mdzes// 
346a3(rgyud 'grel): lag na bum pa thogs nas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra// mchod yon bka' bsgo sogs byin la// gzi brjid can des 'di ltar bya// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pa 
346a4(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur// shAkya seng ge skyobs pa yis// ci ltar bdud kyi ste bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi stabs// rgyal bar byas nas dkyil 'khor bri// de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni// de 'i 
346a5(rgyud 'grel): thim par rnam par bsam// sa la gsol pa gdab pa'o// 'bul rgyan gdu bu rna brgyan dang // skyebar nor bus rnam par brtan// mchod phyir thogs bdag thal ba'i// phyag rgyas yan lag kun rnams brgyan// dpal ldan khrag 'azung 
346a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor che// bsgoms nas bgegs ni bsal bar bya// de nas rkang pa gnyis su yi ge hUM las 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang / mig gnyis su ma dang ta las zla ba dang nyi ma bsams te/ rdo rje'i lta bas thams cad du bltas la// lag pa
346a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis dril bu bzung zhing // g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor ba la 'bad cing khA tAM ga legs par 'khyud nas/ sa de na gnas pa 'dis bskul bar bya'o// sems can gyi don byed par rtsom gyis// lha dang / glu dang / gnod sbyin 
346a8(rgyud 'grel): dang / dri za dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / srin po la sogs pa gnas kyi bdag po gang su yang rung ba khyed byer cig/ myur du song shig/ 'di ltar dpal he ru ka'i bka' thos nas/ myur du song shig/ gang dag mi 
346b1(rgyud 'grel): shA na// nAg ba gags pa shA/ na rdzun gsupa rgya dung// dbang na gas nas pa rnams// gams nas na gsum phyug 
346b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me lta bu'i 'od zer gyis rkang pa nis byung nas/ 'dug pa rnams bsregs par gyur na/ phan tshun 'bros par gyur par bsam ma// g.yas dang g.yon du bskor ba dang // ku tsa bi rab 'khyud pa dang // ba ra ti dang sa tI kri/ 'bre te 
346b3(rgyud 'grel): k+She shig kya la sogs// chags bcas tshul gyi sbyor ba ni// rol pas rab tu 'phyang ba dang // rol pa'i gom stabs bcas pa 'am// goms pa brgyad pas gar bya'o// rkang pa bskyod dang lag pa bskyod// smin 'degs rab 
346b4(rgyud 'grel): dka'i rjes su 'brang // cung zad ngo tsha'i migazung dang // brlab rgyas bltas na sdug pa dang // mig yangs gar ni byed 'gyur zhing // kha'i pad+mar 'dzum dang bcas// cung zad mche ba ma mchu dmar// kun d+ha zla ltar dri med pa'o// 
346b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// sems can sgrol ba rmad du byung // de la sogs pa'i gar gyis ni// bgegs la sogs pasgrag par byed// zhal bzhi la sogs sngags kyis ni// pur bu rab dra ba bya// mtha' yi dbyangs yig/ 
346b6(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i// snga tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin pa// yi ge bdun pa'i sngags kyis ni// rdo rje lta bas bltas nas ni// dkyil 'khor gyis ni sa'i cha// nyes dang ldan yang dag par 'gyur// bgegs bsal ba'o// glu'i gzugs 
346b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs las byung // re la sogs pa ji bzhin bsam// in tra ni la rang bzhin sar// 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid bsam// sna tshogs 'dab ma 'jam pa la// ji bzhin gnas su rnam par bsam// a li ka li la

347a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam// rang bzhin mi gnas ye shes 'khor lo ni// dam tshig 'khor lor 'di yis gzhug par bya// rkang pa gnan cing gyen du blta// gyen du po zhes sgra sgrogs pa// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams
347a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug/ dang por cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du sngags dang bcas pas so// 'dzub mo btud byas gung mo rtser sbyar te// mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab sbyar la// dpral ba'i phyogs su legs par//

347b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bas// tshogs brtul zhugs can gzhug bya// lha la gsol ba gdab pa'o// slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pa// lhag par gnas bya mchod par bya// bu tshur theg pa chen po lu// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te//
